summary: Male Nord RaceMenu Preset for a "weathered" guy
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff7700][size=4][b]Intention:[/b][/size][/color][color=#ff7700]
[size=3][b]----------------------------[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]after a long time of absence from Skyrim, i thought i reinstall and give RaceMenu finally a try.
(amazing Mod !) ... so i wanted to create a tough, male guy this time ...
think there are waaay to much "Legolas-Glamourgirls/boys-PrettyFaces..." out there ...

So i fiddled around with RaceMenu, and i guess, while waiting for Mad Max Fury Road,
i came out with something ... well, that looks at least something like main Protagonist ...
(well, somehow,.. maybe, both eyes closed ...)

anyway, storywise i wanted a guy, who has been through a lot,
maybe farmer ... family killed by bandits ... almost battered to death ... nearly survived ....
you get the idea

hope you like the preset[/size]

[size=3][color=#ff7700][b][size=4]Required:
[/size][/b][/color][color=#ff7700][size=3][b]----------------------------[/b][/size][/color]
to make this preset work you need !!! to have SKSE and RaceMenu installed !

if not already installed get

latest SKSE Version from
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]http://skse.silverlock.org/[/url]

RaceMenu
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?[/url]


[/size][size=3][color=#ff7700][b][size=4]Recommended :
[size=3][color=#ff7700][size=3][b]----------------------------[/b][/size][/color][/size]
[/size][/b][/color]
Mods i used in the screenshots:

SKSE
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]http://skse.silverlock.org/[/url]

RaceMenu by Expired
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?[/url]

XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement by Xenius
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2356/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2356/?[/url]

Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles by Chris57 and FavoredSoul
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?[/url]

XCE - Warpaint and Dirt by Xenius
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29977/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29977/?[/url]

Beards and Brows by Hvergelmir
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?[/url]

Freckle Mania by tetrodoxin
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52841/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52841/?[/url]

KS Hairdos - Renewal by Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?[/url]

Custom Exes ... but i guess any natural high-res greenish or brownish will do ....

[/size]
[size=3][color=#ff7700][b][size=4]Installing the preset:
--------------------------[/size][/b][/color]

(detailed Readme inside the file)

locate your RaceMenu preset folder. (If folder do not already exist, just create them)

[color=#6aa84f]Your SKYRIM DIRECTORY\Data\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen\Presets
[/color]
or for ModOrganizer Users
[color=#6aa84f]
Your ModOrganizer Directory\mods\skse\plugins\CharGen\Presets[/color]

Copy the Max-FuryNord.jslot file to your Preset Folder[/size]

[size=3]That's it! Hope it works for you.
Have Fun and Cheese
Thanks!



[b]CREDITS
--------------------------[/b]

Many thanks, Credits and respekt for their beautifull work to
SKSE-Team, expired6978, Xenius, Chris57, FavoredSoul, Hvergelmir,
tetrodoxin, Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky, WolfGrimDark
[/size]
author: Mjuut
